data.title: Sexiest Naked Massacre Nude Scenes, Top Pics & Videos
data.meta_description: Looking for Naked Massacre nude scenes? Find them all here, plus the hottest sex scenes from movies and television when you visit Mr. Skin!
data.text: If you’re looking for escapist entertainment, then close the DVD case and slowly back away from Naked Massacre (1976). If, on the other hand, you’re ex-SPECK-ting a twisted descent into skigoriac decadence, then you’ve come to the right place. Mathieu Carrière stars as Cain Adamson, a mentally disturbed Vietnam vet on his way back to the States. On a layover in Ireland, he invades an apartment shared by eight pretty nursing students, whom he sadistically tortures, terrorizes, and murders. Leonora Fani is a sight for sore eyes baring snookers in the shower 8 minutes in, but she and Christine Boisson just might make your eyes sore with a disturbing nude scene featuring coerced lesbianism and a graphic stabbing 56 minutes in. Candy Stripe Nurses this isn’t.
